mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_school_setting ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, school_id, type, start_date, end_date, parameters) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{schoolId}, #{type}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{parameters});
mapper.update: UPDATE b_school_setting SET gmt_modify = now(), type = #{type}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, parameters = #{parameters} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT ss.id, ss.school_id AS schoolId, s.name AS schoolName, s.subject AS schoolSubject, ss.type, ss.start_date AS startDate, ss.end_date AS endDate, ss.parameters FROM b_school_setting ss, b_school s WHERE ss.school_id = s.id ORDER BY gmt_create DESC;

SELECT ss.id, ss.school_id AS schoolId, s.name AS schoolName, s.subject AS schoolSubject, ss.type, ss.start_date AS startDate, ss.end_date AS endDate, ss.parameters FROM b_school_setting ss, b_school s WHERE ss.school_id = s.id AND s.id = #{id};

SELECT ss.id, ss.school_id AS schoolId, s.name AS schoolName, s.subject AS schoolSubject, ss.type, ss.start_date AS startDate, ss.end_date AS endDate, ss.parameters FROM b_school_setting ss, b_school s WHERE ss.school_id = s.id AND s.id = #{schoolId};
